textBeforeTable: Playlist Tracks:  *Selected Shorts* - Shorts from a href=http://www.zbs.org/ target=_newZBS/a's *2 Minute Film Noir*, *Head and Leg*'s _In Your Dreams_, Jerry Modjeski's _Scorched Ear Policy_, and the BBC's Dr. Who Sound Effects. *Feature Presentation* - *The Valhalla Triangle*, Episode 3. From a href=http://www.minds-ear.org/ target=_newMind's Ear Audio Productions/a in Bloomington, IN, and written by David Gasking. Odin sends in plans to build a new residence for the three Norse Gods, at the end of the High Street.   Download Listen Now Jerry Stearns DJs:  June 22, 2008 Sound Affects: A Radio Playground Program:
